channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Bike in River Chelt.

item.title: Illuminated traffic bollard, 3rd January

Has been knocked over and thrown in bushes

item.title: Large Pothole near lamppost number 14 on Windyridge Road, 2nd January
item.description:
There is a large/deep pothole in the road near lamppost 14 on Windyridge Road, Wymans Brook. If a cyclist hit this hole it could quite possibly result in a fatality. I have also witnessed cars swerving to miss it and having a near miss with oncoming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Windyridge Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing sign, 2nd January
item.description:
Northbound direction sign to Oxenton is missing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti tags along the length of the wall and into Carlton Place, 2nd January
item.description:
Tags 'chops' and 'kaosys' every two meters or so along the wall on at Paul's road and into Carlton place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed TV, 2nd January
item.description:
Smashed TV on footpath. Screen separate, on grass nearby.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 63 Saint Georges Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of substantial potholes, 1st January
item.description:
At the bottom of the hill the road is very badly broken up with a series of substantial pot holes which are a serious risk to cyclists particularly bring located at the bottom of a hill. Recently the road was closed for major repairs however for some reason they did not repair the worse parts. The cycling community can not understand why the job was not tackled.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Covered Cattle Shed Dixton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dunelm Mill Shopping trolley abandoned at the community centre on Brooklyn Road, 1st January
item.description:
I’ve tried reporting it on the TrolleyWise app but I don’t believe they take Dunelm Mill

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constantly failing road surface, 1st January
item.description:
This site has been failing for a number of years, stop patching it. Dig it up and sort the job properly!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 329 Innsworth Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parts and carpet cleaner dumped obstructing path, 1st January
item.description:
On pavement obstructing walking. People have been adding rubber gloves and empty glass bottles of alcohol. There is also oil from a car in a tub with no lid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Stearman Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti including obscene word, 31st December
item.description:
Graffiti on the church, including a very obscene word which I'm not going to type out. Very upsetting, please could you remove this asap. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Clarence Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pile of signs from headway traffic management outside Majestic Wine on the road, 31st December
item.description:
They’ve obviously been there for some time all the grass has died underneath can somebody pick them up please or contact headway

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit K2 Manor Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water flood over road, 31st December
item.description:
By the traffic lights once again the road is flooded over both lanes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Orchard House The Wharf, Coombe Hill
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighing not reinstated after building of distribution center, 30th December
item.description:
During the construction of the new Amazon Distribution center the lighting on the foot/cycle path between Centre Seven & Sainsbury's was disconnected. The distribution center is now complete but the street lighting hasn't been reinstated. With no other street lights near the path, this section is very dark especially with the long winter nights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Corinium Avenue, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lights not working on A40 Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Gloucester, 30th December
item.description:
There are a number of street lights not working on A40 Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Longlevens, Gloucester (approx. 10). They have been out of action for a few months. This has meant the roundabout is dark in places .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elm Bridge Court, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Derestriction sign, 30th December
item.description:
There were originally two of these, one either side of the road, one has been missing for at least 5 years

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Haybarn House Brockhampton Lane, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 30th December
item.description:
Selection of blue rubbish bags been there for months .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Little Benges Marlpit Lane, Norton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotten fencing. M5 Southbound between junc11 and junc11a at WOODHOUSE farm., 29th December
item.description:
The motorway fence is totally rotted and falling over. I’ve used my own stakes and tied it up in places. We have cattle and sheep and this should have been dealt with as routine maintenance. This is the second time I’ve reported it. It’s against fields just north of WOODHOUSE Farm on the southbound side of M5. GL34RD. Feel free to inspect from the farm side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many potholes on uphill side of road, 29th December
item.description:
The potholes on the uphill side of the road are truly awful for those on motorbikes. It’s very dangerous when wet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet
